name: Speed Turbo Car Racing
description:
You have to drive your rush car in the street and have to beat all the racers racing against you on the super highway. The highways and a super car is like a dream come true. This time, it is all yours to explore your wondrous locations in this driving super car game

Features:
Realistic 3D graphics
Real sound effects
Multiple super cars
No traffic laws and rules
Challenge mode to test your driving skills
